Name: Burning Vengeance
About the game: Burning Vengeance is an Oldschool back-to-basics violent 3rd Person shooter without rainbows and unicorns. - time restricted Bullettime and psychomode for cineastic eye-for-an-eye-confrontations. - Arcade point system to upgrade your charactertraits. - fill your combometer up through killing guys in short succession to get extra points. - tons of findable guns - intuitive granade- and melee System - 62 Steam achievements for long lasting action fun. Unapologetic fun for Boomers and Gen X MOFOs feel good while shooting scumbags in the head! Buy It Now! ...please
